statements: DELETE FROM office_hours WHERE start_time < NOW();
DELETE FROM office_hours WHERE instructor_id = 123 AND start_time < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM office_hours WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM students WHERE grade = 'A')
DELETE FROM office_hours WHERE instructor_id = (SELECT MAX(instructor_id) FROM instructors)
DELETE FROM instructor_availability WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' AND start_time >= '09:00:00' AND end_time <= '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM office_hours WHERE instructor_id = 1 AND date = '2022-10-10';
DELETE FROM Instructors WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM student_appointments WHERE appointment_time < NOW();
DELETE FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT instructor_id FROM instructor_availability);
